nodes.text: To Hunt the Hutt is a scenario for the Star Wars Miniatures Battles game, written by Stephen Crane and published in Imperial Entanglements. It depicts a battle between the Grim Destiny bounty hunter team led by Garm Trodask and the retinue of gangster Mennac the Hutt of the criminal Vanderijar clan and her consort Jobwah in a docking bay on the planet Trendivar.

Grim Destiny, a team of bounty hunters led by Garm Trodask, is on the hunt for Mennac the Hutt of the criminal Vanderijar clan. They corner her, her consort Jobwah, and their retinue in a docking bay on Trandivar, and the battle is joined.
